name: Official Minecraft Wiki
description: Minecraft Wiki is a complete resource for Minecraft, including gameplay, blocks, crafting, updates, events, mods, running a server, and resource packs.

name: Chinese Minecraft Wiki
description: The Chinese Minecraft Wiki is an official wiki of Minecraft, covering detailed tutorials on crafting, blocks, creatures and even PE versions.

name: wiki.vg
description: Technical Minecraft wiki.

name: Minecraft Forums
description: Official community forums, a great place to talk about the game.

name: Planet Minecraft
description: Creative community fansite.

name: Minecraft Chinese Forum
description: Largest Chinese players community of Minecraft.

name: Minecraft Forge
description: Modifications to the Minecraft base files to assist in compatibility between mods.

name: Fabric
description: A lightweight, experimental modding toolchain for Minecraft.

name: liteloader
description: A lightweight mod loader for Minecraft designed to provide simple, high-performance and reliable loader functionality for mods which don't need to modify game mechanics.

name: Meddle
description: Everything related to modding 1.9/1.10 snapshots in one place.

name: RopeMC
description: A lightweight, reflection based mod loader which aims to be user friendly and later version independent.

name: Optifine
description: OptiFine is a Minecraft optimization mod.

name: BetterFps
description: BetterFps is a Minecraft mod that add a few performance improvements.

name: Custom Skin Loader
description: Custom Skin Loader for Minecraft.

name: Universal Skin Mod
description: A Minecraft Forge Mod allows players load custom skin & cape textures.

name: Journey Map
description: Real-time mapping in game or in a web browser as you explore.

name: Just Enough Items (JEI)
description: JEI is an item and recipe viewing mod for Minecraft, built from the ground up for stability and performance.

name: Bibliocraft
description: Bibliocraft is a storage and organizational mod that began as a single bookcase and has expanded to so much more.

name: /dank/null
description: A storage mod of unreal proportions which nobody really gets. The max tier /dank/null object holds 54 slots of items which each can hold 2.14 billion items!

name: Tinkers Construct
description: Tinkers' Construct is a mod about putting tools together in a wide variety of ways, then modifying them until they turn into something else.

name: Immersive Engineering
description: Immersive Engineering is a tech mod with a certain charm, based on the ideas and concepts, and with most assets created by Damien Hazard.

name: Botania
description: Botania is a tech mod in essence. The theme is natural magic.

name: Thermal Foundation + Dynamics + Expansion
description: A server-friendly and content-rich blend of magic and technology! Title is three different mod names, but of the same series and usually played together.

name: Railcraft
description: Greatly expand and improve the Minecart system in Minecraft.

name: Actually Additions
description: Actually Additions is a technology mod that adds various utilities like multitools, item magnets, atomic reconstructors and so on.

name: Applied Energistics 2
description: A Minecraft Mod about Matter, Energy and using them to conquer the world. Mainly focused on item storage.

name: Draconic Evolution
description: One of the best tech mod there is, but really overpowered in the late game. Adds things like a Draconic Power Core which no one has been able to fill yet...

name: Ender IO
description: A large ender themed mod, that just adds lots of new fun things.

name: Galacticraft
description: A mod that adds rockets and new planets to explore. Expandable with addons.

name: OpenComputers
description: OpenComputers is a mod that adds computers and robots into the game, which can be programmed in Lua 5.3.

name: ComputerCraft
description: Adds computers based on Lua (5.2 and 5.3) into Minecraft.

name: WarpDrive
description: Adds Star Trek and other franchise like ships, weapons, transporters and so on into the game. Also adds new planets (dimensions).

name: Pam's HarvestCraft
description: Pam's HarvestCraft is a mod for Minecraft that currently adds many kinds of crops and food.

name: AgriCraft
description: A mod that adds a more sophisticated crop system, like the ability to have genetic mutations and also adds more crops.

name: Bonsai Trees
description: Adds essentially mini tree farms which are one block big.

name: Ex Nihilo: Creatio
description: A great mod for skyblocks, it filters things like sand and gravel for useful resources like iron and diamond, compatible with lots of mods.

name: RFTools
description: RFTools is a mod containing various tools that are related to RF (Redflux) or technology in general.

name: Extreme Reactors
description: Adds nuclear reactors with the fictional fuel 'yellorium'. A carry on of the original Big Reactors.

name: Zetta Industries
description: A mod which adds the main multiblock of a big battery.

name: Applied Energistics 2
description: A Minecraft Mod about Matter, Energy and using them to conquer the world.

name: AbyssalCraft
description: AbyssalCraft is a magic mod centered around exploration.

name: Astral Sorcery
description: This is a magic mod based on the stars, and harnessing the powers of starlight and the constellations.

name: Avaritia
description: Avaritia is a mod with a really long progression tree, but really overpowered in the late game. Its soul purpose is to drag the endgame gameplay to extreme lengths.

name: Blood Magic
description: This is a magic mod based on blood. Beware, you die a lot.

name: TNTUtils
description: More control over explosions in Minecraft.

name: Akashic Tome
description: A mod based on Morph-o-Tool, which mainly gives the ability to merge different mods' documentation books.

name: AppleSkin
description: This mod does not change any existing mechanics, but simply makes the existing hunger saturation and exhaustion levels visible in the default GUI.

name: Attribute Fixer
description: This mod fixes the attribute system in Minecraft which handles things like armour points, because many other mods are inadvertantly affected by a limit in this system.

name: Diet Hopper
description: This mod modifies the way Minecraft calculates the collision boxes of the hopper, so that you can access any visible blocks behind it.

name: FoamFix
description: Fixes various aspects of the Minecraft code, generally making the game faster.

name: ArmorPlus
description: This mod literally adds tons of armors to the game, and different ways of crafting them.

name: Baubles
description: This mod adds seven new slots to the player inventory which can be fitted with various items like amulets, belts, rings and so on added by other mods.

name: Aroma1997's Dimensional World
description: This mod adds one extra dimension, with the intended purpose of mining, meaning the Overworld will not be filled up with things like Buildcraft quarry holes anymore etc.

name: Twilight Forest
description: Adds a new twilight forest dimension with new sturctures, bosses, and quests to complete.

name: Carpenter's Blocks
description: This mod adds new blocks such as slants and corners which can be made to look like any other block in the game! Extremely useful for artistic builds. (For 1.12+ see BlockCraftery)

name: Chisel
description: This mod adds multiple new textures to lots of blocks in the game, adding a wide variety of textures. (For editing units smaller than blocks see Chisel and Bits.)

name: WorldEdit
description: WorldEdit is an open source in-game map editor available for Bukkit, Forge, MinecraftEdu, and many other platforms.

name: FAWE
description: Stands for Fast Async WorldEdit. Based upon WorldEdit, it is simply faster, and adds lots more tools (i.e. brushes) to work with.

name: AntiCheatReloaded
description: AntiCheatReloaded helps server admins easily identify and block malicious users by monitoring and analyzing the behaviour of their players.

name: ViaVersion
description: Allows the connection of newer clients to older server versions for Minecraft servers.

name: AdvancedKitsReloaded
description: AdvancedKitsReloaded is a Kit managing plugin for Minecraft servers which runs Bukkit, CraftBukkit, Spigot and Paper (>1.8). With this plugin you can easily create/edit/delete your kits and you can customize it as much as you'd like.

name: WorldGuard
description: WorldGuard lets you and players guard areas of land against griefers and undesirables, as well as tweak and disable various gameplay features of Minecraft.

name: CraftBook
description: CraftBook lets you create magically extending bridges, compact Redstone circuits, complex Minecart mechanics, and much more â€” all without a client mod and fully customizable by the server.

name: Blessing Skin Server
description: A web application brings your custom skins back in offline Minecraft servers.

name: yoshino
description: A lite & fast Minecraft skin server, written in php. (Live Demo)

name: WorldEdit Golf
description: Challenge others in a competition to use WorldEdit in as few commands as possible.

name: CraftLib
description: Complete Kotlin / Java library for wrapping the entire Minecraft codebase, including protocol, NBT, schematics, chat and more.

name: MCProtocolLib
description: A simple library for communicating with a Minecraft client/server, written in Java.

name: node-minecraft-protocol
description: A NodeJS library to parse and serialize minecraft packets, plus authentication and encryption.

name: Minecraft Command Helper
description: A WPF Program about generate Minecraft Command (with NBT data). (Windows Only)

name: Minecraft Command Science
description: Several Minecraft vanilla JSON generators.

name: Amidst
description: Display an overview of a Minecraft world, without actually creating it.

name: MultiMC
description: A custom launcher for Minecraft that allows you to easily manage multiple installations of Minecraft at once.

name: HMCL
description: A powered Minecraft launcher that supports a lot of features.

name: FML Mod Development Tutorial
description: (Chinese) Minecraft 1.8.9 FML Mod Development Tutorial.

name: SchematicWebViewer
description: A JavaScript/TypeScript library for rendering and viewing Minecraft schematic files on the web.
